Articles.Content:
This is my first time making a mod of any sort. Programming isn't my specialty so this mod is going to be my own little experiment. I'm not sure what the optimal polygon count is for a Kerbal mod so right now Serenity is only 1,371 polygons. If the game can run this mesh fine, I may add more detail to it. I obviously have yet to texture her but here is what I have so far. Critiques are welcome!

<img src="http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Boogaman/Kerbal/serenity2.jpg"/>

<img src="http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Boogaman/Kerbal/serenity1.jpg"/>

OH MY GOD. I love you.

That is great work! I look forward to seeing this completed.

Edit: Can we get a side view? It's hard to see the height of the neck of the ship.

Absolutely! I'll be honest this task is daunting to me so if the code starts to push me away, I will gladly make this model available to the community so someone else could do as they wish with it. There was a Normandy mod that looked beautiful but sadly ended up not being finished. If it gets to the point where my knowledge of coding can't get it working, I'll let someone else use the assets. After all, I've seen people asking for Serenity for a while.

Anywho, side image, as requested.

<img src="http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Boogaman/Kerbal/serenity3.jpg"/>

Take me out to the black

Tell 'em I ain't comin' back

Burn the land and boil the sea

You can't take the sky from me...

She could use much more polygons. Really. Those... things around the tail are way too angular. 1.3K polies is virtually nothing for KSP; 3K per single part would still run O.K.

BTW I guess she will not go as a single part? A pod, a hinge (x2), side engine (x2 too), a hull (is Kaylee there? ) with fuel tank... and, apparently, ASAS (otherwise she's not flyable when VTOLing). An entire set might have up to 20K polygons.

Waitin' for release!

UPD. Feel free to consult me on coding (preferably in PM). I want this bird flying.

Edited August 12, 2012 by Tosh
Yeah, you could use more polygons easily. However I disgree on the poster above, don't make it too much. A lower amount will get a larger audience, because not everybody runs on high end computers.

A lower amount will get a larger audience, because not everybody runs on high end computers.
*sighs* If you only knew on what computer I've got my "3K-per-part" rule... It's a dinosaur well below KSP's minimal system requirements

To reiterate once again: maximum load goes from physics (i.e. part count; e.g. my rig doesn't handle 50-part ships well); next is the texture size (some shaders are really heavy; I've managed to freeze the game to slideshow with a simple cube with wrong shader), and poly count is the last thing to be concerned about (for example, 7K parts made no noticeable impact on in-game performance).

Edited August 12, 2012 by Tosh

She could use much more polygons. Really. Those... things around the tail are way too angular. 1.3K polies is virtually nothing for KSP; 3K per single part would still run O.K.

Yeah, that's the only thing that kinda sticks out at me. They do have a bit of an angle on them, but I'm not a modder so I dunno if that's easy to fix or not. Also, I imagine the textures my make the angular part less noticeable? I did notice there's a little bit missing off the top part of the tail, you can see it here -> http://www.imgbase.info/images/safe-wallpapers/tv_movies/serenity/7081_serenity_sci-fi.jpg

Otherwise I think it looks excellent!
good luck with your mod boogaman. i dont think i need to say i'm a fan of Serenity.
This looks like a really nice mod, can't wait to see the finished product.

Take me out to the black

Tell 'em I ain't comin' back

Burn the land and boil the sea

You can't take the sky from me...

She could use much more polygons. Really. Those... things around the tail are way too angular. 1.3K polies is virtually nothing for KSP; 3K per single part would still run O.K.

BTW I guess she will not go as a single part? A pod, a hinge (x2), side engine (x2 too), a hull (is Kaylee there? ) with fuel tank... and, apparently, ASAS (otherwise she's not flyable when VTOLing). An entire set might have up to 20K polygons.

Waitin' for release!

UPD. Feel free to consult me on coding (preferably in PM). I want this bird flying.

I thoroughly appreciate that, Tosh. In fact, after hours of fiddling with the KSP Unity Package, I may ask a few questions. However, I'm still a ways away.

I'm going to be adding more geometry to the mesh today as she really could use more detail to define her. I'll post some new pictures by the end of the day.

So her polygon count is a bit beefier but still well under 20k polygons. She's 9,732 polys right now and unless there are any blaring errors I've made that you folks point out, I'm going to head right on into texturing.

<img src="http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Boogaman/Kerbal/serenity4.jpg"/>

<img src="http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Boogaman/Kerbal/serenity5.jpg"/>

<img src="http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Boogaman/Kerbal/serenity6.jpg"/>

So her polygon count is a bit beefier but still well under 20k polygons. She's 9,732 polys right now and unless there are any blaring errors I've made that you folks point out, I'm going to head right on into texturing.
WOOT

That's Firefly-class at its best))

I'd suggest teaching 'er to fly before texturing. You may need to split 'er into several parts, which may require changing UV maps.
That is one sexy ship. I can haz now? Plz?

WOOT

That's Firefly-class at its best))

I'd suggest teaching 'er to fly before texturing. You may need to split 'er into several parts, which may require changing UV maps.

Very true! In fact, I decided to do a quick test just to make sure I could get a cockpit into KSP. This is the mod in its infancy but there is something fulfilling about seeing this...

<img src="http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Boogaman/Kerbal/screenshot0.png"/>
Do you have an estimated release date, I have been waiting ages for someone to develop Serenity for KSP as I do not have the skills or time to construct one myself.
Wow... I just watched the series for the first time. Psychic moment?
My god..... Firefly lives again!
So stoked! Love the way it looks in orbit right now. Can't wait to see the final product! (Or even one thats not final but we get to play with)
i loved firefly and i loved the movie serenity, this is going to be awesome
Looks amazing already! Good job. Keep it up.
If this comes in the standard form of a parts pack how many parts are going to be in the pack?
This is really cool! I assume this will be "just for fun" and have near-infinate fuel.
I do not watch the series, or even necessarily plan to (unless someone gives me a reason lol), but this is awesome! I plan to start mod-producing soon!

A reason? It's a Sci-Fi Western. It's funny. It has lovable characters. The soundtrack is awesome. You could find worse ways to waste your time.

Don't be put off by the battle scene at the beginning of the pilot... Let's just say it shows that it wasn't a very costly production.

The semester just recently started up so I haven't had as much time to work on it unfortunately. I'm currently trying to figure out how to place nodes in the appropriate locations. My estimated release date is somewhere around November.

Between the semester and the show I'm in, I don't have a whole lot of time to work on it. However, if someone knows how to assemble the nodes correctly, I'd be more than glad to hand them my mesh so it could get release earlier.

Trust me, I want to see this bird fly too
